title: hypnotic tribal drums, ostinat
caption: hypnotic tribal drums, ostinato rhythm, repetitive percussion, trance-inducing beat, shamanic, world fusion, juno reactor
lyrics:
[Verse 1]  
Grab your gear, sky's on fire,  
Blast through madness, fuel the desire.  
Hues explode, barriers shatter,  
Gate crashes wide, no time to chatter.  

[Build]  
Rhythm ramps, slots click tight,  
Off-kilter thumps, ignite the fight.  
Surge hits deep, subs rumble fierce,  
Turn it loud, pierce the pierce.  

[Chorus]  
Trip around the world,  
Trip around the world,  
Trip around the world,  
World, world, world!  

[Drop]  
Bass pounds raw, groove gets warped,  
Head-spinning surge, get absorbed.  
Realms collide, plot twists wild,  
Endless haul, style undefiled.  

[Verse 2]  
Scale the highs, plunge the deeps,  
Flames ignite, the craving creeps.  
Vintage pounds, bolts from above,  
Rouse the squad, shove comes to shove.  

[Build]  
Temp spikes, blasts break free,  
Ragged pulses, crank the spree.  
Rush builds strong, primed to explode,  
Bust the roof, reload the mode.  

[Chorus]  
Trip around the world,  
Trip around the world,  
Trip around the world,  
World, world, world!  

[Outro]  
Ease off gradual, path blurs away,  
Vibe hangs tough, here to stay.  
World, world, world...  
Push on forever, own the fray.
